Show / Hide Table of Contents

Namespace DUKE

Classes

AudioController

Control the audio of the program. Offer public static methods to activate audio clips and music.

BuildingDrawer

Design a building by drawing a floor plan and scaling it with the desired number of stories.

BuildingEstimator

Calculate an approximate shape of a building based on provided parameters.

BuildingVolumeObject

ColorReader

Read the color of a texture asset at the specified point.

DataPointObject

Contains a single DataPoint. This component is mainly used for displaying Graph data information.

DataVisualisationUI

Controls the UI components of Data Visualisation UI.

DigitalTwinsInfoController

Control the toggling of info panels in Digital Twins scene. Used through Highlightables' UnityEvents.

Dimension

Draw a dimension line on an axis and display its length.

DimensionLine

A single dimension line used for displaying measurements and dimensions.

DimensionLineControl

Define the placement of a Dimension.

DrawAction

A container for an action that involves drawing on a plane.

FadeOrb

Reads KLHManager's FadeValue and sets the opacity of an orb based on it.

FPSCounter

Calculate current FPS and display it with TextMeshPro.

IndicatorLineObject

Show a 3D wire cube when the user is drawing on the BuildingDrawer plane.

InverseMeshCollision

Invert the attached MeshCollider's mesh. Used for defining areas with BlockMovement layer to prevent the user from floating through walls in desktop mode. NOTE: Remember to uncheck "Convex" from MeshCollider or the direction of normals does not matter.

KLHManager

Controls the states of the game and relevant parameters. This object uses the Singleton pattern and is persistent independent of the loading or unloading of Scenes.

LookAtPlayer

Turn the Transform to face Player.

LookPoint

A point on the floor to which the user can move to by clicking it. Forward direction is specified.

MeshUtility

Static class containing useful Mesh methods.

ObjectDimensions

Display object's dimensions with lines and labels.

PlayerSpawnPoint

Attach to a Transform to mark it as a Scene-specific start position.

ScaleController

SceneController

Controls the loading and unloading of Scenes specific to KLH.

SceneRoot

Send this GameObject to KLHManager as a root object.

TeleportDoor

Teleport Player to specified location.

TranslationElement

Translate TextMeshPro or TextMeshProUGUI component's text that is attached to this GameObject.

TranslatorSO

A ScriptableObject which contains an array of TextTranslations. This object uses the Singleton pattern and can be referenced as a static object.

Turntable

Spin the object around an axis.

Structs

BuildingBounds

A collection of information about a DrawGrid's dimensions.

BuildingEstimation

Estimation of a building's dimensions based on total heat consumption.

DrawGridState

A recorded state of DrawGrid.

TextTranslation

Contains every translation of a specific ID.

Enums

AudioLevel

DimensionMeasurementSource

Selected source of the dimension. Implemented only partially.

DrawActionState

Progress states of a DrawAction.

GraphDataSelection

Flags for selecting data from Graph.

GraphType

Different types of Graph.

KLHMode

Different modes of the program.

Language

Usable languages of the program.
